processing.app.syntax.im

Class InputMethodSupport

  • Object
    • InputMethodSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputMethodListener, InputMethodRequests, EventListener

    public class InputMethodSupport
extends Object
implements InputMethodRequests, InputMethodListener
    On-the-spot style input support for CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean).
    See Also:
    Bugzilla 854: implement input method support for Japanese (and other languages), Bugzilla 1531: Can't input full-width space when Japanese IME is on., Java Input Method Framework (IMF) Technology, The Java Tutorials
